messages.subject: Local groups listing
messages.msgSnippet: Someone asked here a while back about local groups (pretty sure it was here) and I got a couple of side e-mails, one of which I think I lost. Could those of
messages.messageBody:
Someone asked here a while back about local groups (pretty sure it was here) and I got a
couple of side e-mails, one of which I think I lost.

Could those of you who have a minute to spare please look at my local listings page and see
if it works for your area, if I've left something out, if a link's broken, etc.? I want to list
groups that are really by and for unschoolers, not just any old playgroup. People can find
those by other means.


There's an e-mail link at the bottom of that page if you want to send me a note, so this list
doesn't fill up with local discussion.

Thanks, anyone with the time and interest to help me edit that up nicely!

Sandra
